com.tinkerpop.gremlin.process

Interface Path

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmptyPath, ImmutablePath, MutablePath

    public interface Path
extends Cloneable
    A Path denotes a particular walk through a Graph as defined by a Traverser. In abstraction, any Path implementation maintains two lists: a list of sets of labels and a list of objects. The list of labels are the labels of the steps traversed. The list of objects are the objects traversed.
    Author:
    Marko A. Rodriguez (http://markorodriguez.com)
